text: Fan didui an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] bing zai da dishang weifeizuodai zhe, dui tamen de chengfa jiang shi sixing, huo ding si zai shizijia shang, huo jiaocuo kan qu tamen de shoujiao, huo liufang yixiang. Zhe shi tamen zai jinshi ying shou de lingru, tamen zai houshi hai yao shou zhongda de xingfa,
